metadata.title: CVE-2017-8817 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The FTP wildcard function in curl and libcurl before 7.57.0 allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read and applicationcrash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a string that endswith an '[' character.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-8817` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

curl - 7.47.0-1ubuntu2.5
libcurl3 - 7.47.0-1ubuntu2.5
libcurl3-gnutls - 7.47.0-1ubuntu2.5
libcurl3-nss - 7.47.0-1ubuntu2.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: curl package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.47.0-1ubuntu2.5').
